skillTree.localised_description: Some Maneater Captains keep their favourite Gnoblar as a "Giant Parrot" on their shoulders. These gnoblars are painted with beautiful plumage and wear masks that makes them look like parrots.
No hide nor armour can stand against the piercing fury of a Maneater's anchor.
If the enormous size of this Ogre doesn't incite terror, his bloody, malevolent smile surely will.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"
You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such methods are blunt and crude in the extreme, but still very, very effective.
If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local region)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Gunnery Mob units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Why would one pretend to be what he is not? There are many reasons, none of them innocent.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: If you're offering enough, most people eventually start to see things your way.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

effects.description:
Income from all enemy buildings: -5%
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.localised_description: A Master Gunner assisting the gunnery crews during a battle is a welcome support, for only he knows how much black powder should be used or what to do when your pistol doesn't work- if he can hear you, that is.

effects.description: "Explosive Bullets" ammunition (projectiles will cause explosive damage)

skillTree.localised_description: A true master knows there is more than one way to defeat your enemies. Being thrown off your feat by a nearby blast is enough to leave many disorientated, deaf and defenceless.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description:
Explosive missile damage +10% 
	(all units in army)

Missile explosion radius: +10%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Maneater Captain has become an Admiral's favourite and they trust him and his endless loyalty when things get sticky.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: This one is often found leading a mounted charge from the front, with his trusted lucky anchor in hand.

effects.description: Enables "Dazed" contact effect (reduced Speed and Melee Defence)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Earning the respect of his subordinates is no small feat, but this one leads his forces with a camaraderie.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for melee infantry units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Such a tiny thing, you need more meat if ye wanna have any impact on the battlefield."

effects.description:
Attribute: Ogre Charge for melee infantry units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

effects.description:
Unit mass: +10% for melee infantry units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: No enemy is immovable when in the path of a furious Ogre's charge.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
This Ogre's greed shall never be sated, for his stomach is as endless as his hunger.
A truly sturdy armour is needed to hold such an overflowing gut in place.
What use armour, or even magical defences, against such powerful ordnance?
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income is modified by an additional 5%
Scavenge action: Income is modified by an additional 10%
Scavenge action: Income is modified by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
"If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit can fire while on the move.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!
"If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."
The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.
Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.
The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.
